Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those who appreciate its unique features and benefits. For this exceptional item, I am proposing a price of $150. This investment will not only provide you with high-quality functionality but also potentially increase in value over time. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
